attractions.name: Ohori Park
attractions.description: A spacious Japanese-style garden and park with a central pond, perfect for walks and boating.

attractions.name: Fukuoka Tower
attractions.description: A 234-meter tall seaside tower offering panoramic views of Hakata Bay and the city skyline.

attractions.name: Canal City Hakata
attractions.description: A large shopping and entertainment complex with a canal running through it, featuring shows and fountains.

attractions.name: Dazaifu Tenmangu Shrine
attractions.description: A famous shrine dedicated to the god of learning, attracting many students and visitors.

attractions.name: Nakasu Yatai Stalls
attractions.description: Open-air food stalls along the river offering Hakata ramen and other local specialties.
